markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cantorian Rejuvenation](/Feats.aspx?ID=5581) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=757" />
<trait label="Vitality" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=509" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 15 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

The life-giving energy that flows in your blood revitalizes you. You recover 4d6 Hit Points and gain 10 temporary Hit Points for 1 minute. At 15th level, you instead recover 6d6 HP and gain 15 temporary HP.
name: Cantorian Rejuvenation
